Desc_NuclearWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissile Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumWaste_C.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

Desc_Battery_C.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

Desc_AluminumIngot_C.description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

Desc_ColorCartridge_C.description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

Desc_Cable_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

Desc_Cement_C.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

Desc_ModularFrame_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

Desc_SteelPlate_C.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_NonFissibleUranium_C.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be converted into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumPellet_C.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_PlutoniumCell_C.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_Silica_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

Desc_IronPlate_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_CrystalShard_C.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

Desc_IronRod_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_Wire_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_IronIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_IronPlateReinforced_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

Desc_Rotor_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

Desc_CopperSheet_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

Desc_IronScrew_C.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Desc_CompactedCoal_C.description: A much more efficient alternative to Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles and coal generators.

Desc_HeavyOilResidue_C.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

Desc_LiquidTurboFuel_C.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_FluidCanister_C.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

Desc_TurboFuel_C.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_CircuitBoard_C.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

Desc_Plastic_C.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

Desc_Motor_C.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Desc_SteelPlateReinforced_C.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

Desc_SteelPipe_C.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

Desc_Rubber_C.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

Desc_LiquidFuel_C.description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

Desc_PolymerResin_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

Desc_PetroleumCoke_C.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement.

Desc_SteelIngot_C.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_2_C.description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_Fuel_C.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_PackagedOil_C.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedOilResidue_C.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_CopperIngot_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

Desc_QuartzCrystal_C.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

Desc_GoldIngot_C.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_AluminumScrap_C.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

Desc_SulfuricAcid_C.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

Desc_UraniumCell_C.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Desc_CoolingSystem_C.description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

Desc_NitricAcid_C.description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

Desc_AluminumCasing_C.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

Desc_AluminumPlate_C.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

Desc_Computer_C.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behavior in machines.

Desc_CrystalOscillator_C.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Desc_AluminaSolution_C.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_1_C.description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_HighSpeedConnector_C.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_3_C.description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_Stator_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

Desc_CircuitBoardHighSpeed_C.description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

Desc_HighSpeedWire_C.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_4_C.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_5_C.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Desc_MotorLightweight_C.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex and more powerful version of the regular Motor.

Desc_PressureConversionCube_C.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

Desc_ModularFrameFused_C.description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

Desc_ComputerSuper_C.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

Desc_ElectromagneticControlRod_C.description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

Desc_CopperDust_C.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, makes this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Desc_GasTank_C.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_9_C.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_7_C.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_6_C.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

Desc_SpaceElevatorPart_8_C.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high-pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Desc_Gunpowder_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

Desc_Filter_C.description: Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxins and pollutants from the air.

Desc_HazmatFilter_C.description: Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.

Desc_AlienProtein_C.description:
Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.

Desc_AlienDNACapsule_C.description:
This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and Pioneers with Coupons.

Desc_Crystal_mk3_C.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

Desc_Crystal_mk2_C.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

Desc_Crystal_C.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

Desc_GunpowderMK2_C.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

Desc_XmasStar_C.description: This special FICSMAS Star signifies the productivity of FICSIT all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

Desc_XmasBallCluster_C.description: All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!

Desc_XmasWreath_C.description: A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

Desc_CandyCane_C.description:
A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Can't be consumed...

Desc_Snow_C.description: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

Desc_XmasBow_C.description: A fancy Bow, maybe someone can wear this? You certainly can't! Probably, some parts and decorations can be made from this.

Desc_XmasBall3_C.description: Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_XmasBall4_C.description: This super special... nope... still just used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_XmasBranch_C.description: A special Tree Branch used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.

Desc_XmasBall2_C.description: Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.

Desc_Gift_C.description:
Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!

Desc_FlowerPetals_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

Desc_Wood_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_GenericBiomass_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

Desc_Biofuel_C.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

Desc_LiquidBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

Desc_PackagedBiofuel_C.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles and the Jetpack.

Desc_PackagedAlumina_C.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedNitricAcid_C.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_PackagedSulfuricAcid_C.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

Desc_Fabric_C.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

Desc_StingerParts_C.description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_SpitterParts_C.description:
The remains of a plasma spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_HogParts_C.description:
The carapace of the alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_HatcherParts_C.description:
The shell-like remains of an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

Desc_Mycelia_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Desc_Leaves_C.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

Build_GeneratorCoal_C.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Build_GeneratorFuel_C.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Build_GeneratorNuclear_C.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

Desc_OreIron_C.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Desc_Stone_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

Desc_Coal_C.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

Desc_Sulfur_C.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

Desc_LiquidOil_C.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

Desc_RawQuartz_C.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

Desc_OreCopper_C.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

Desc_OreGold_C.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

Desc_OreUranium_C.description:
Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Desc_NitrogenGas_C.description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

Desc_OreBauxite_C.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.
